itemSummaries.title: Vintage Omega Seamaster Automatic Watch - 1960s
itemSummaries.shortDescription: Beautiful Omega Seamaster from the 1960s in excellent condition. Automatic movement.
itemSummaries.fullDescription: Beautiful Omega Seamaster from the 1960s in excellent condition. Features an automatic movement that has been recently serviced. Comes with original box and papers. The watch shows minimal signs of wear for its age and keeps excellent time.

itemSummaries.title: Rolex Datejust 36mm Stainless Steel - Box and Papers
itemSummaries.shortDescription: Authentic Rolex Datejust with complete box and papers. Excellent condition.
itemSummaries.fullDescription: Authentic Rolex Datejust 36mm in stainless steel. This watch comes complete with original box and papers. The watch is in excellent condition with minimal wear. Features include: automatic movement, date function, jubilee bracelet, and stainless steel fluted bezel.

itemSummaries.title: Vintage Seiko 6139 Chronograph - Pogue - All Original
itemSummaries.shortDescription: Rare Seiko 6139 "Pogue" chronograph in all original condition. Sought-after collector piece.
itemSummaries.fullDescription: Rare Seiko 6139 "Pogue" chronograph in all original condition. This sought-after collector piece is named after Colonel William Pogue who wore this model on the Skylab 4 mission. Features include: automatic movement with chronograph function, day/date display, original bracelet, and the iconic yellow dial. The watch has been serviced and all functions work properly.
